description: Requests for approval of plans and specifications relating to the re-alignment of York Way both horizontally (up to 40 metres to the west) and vertically (as much as 2 metres below existing ground level).  Works include: alterations to the North London Line bridges; alterations to the existing vehicular accesses north of the North London Line bridge (serving no.184 York Way), to the Bell Isle site (currently occupied by York Way Metals) and to the former petrol filling station at nos.176-178 York Way (from Randell's Road); the re-alignment of the western part of Randell's Road, and; the erection of security fencing along the eastern side of the re-aligned York Way.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVES: AS PER DECISION LETTER DATED 15/12/98.
